评论详情: It looks good but it’s made of very cheap material that will pill right away. I wish I hadn’t bought it.

This hoodie is super trendy and has that Y2K streetwear look, but honestly, I’m surprised by all the positive reviews. The quality isn’t great—it’s definitely made of polyester and feels like it won’t last long. The material is the kind that’ll get those little fabric pills after a few washes. One feature I didn’t notice when ordering is the double zipper. It’s not my favorite, but it could be a nice touch if that matters to you. Overall, cute for the style, but don’t expect it to hold up well!
